text:
I believe that you can add the email property value in the URL of the unsubscribe button.

Something like:
• <http://myurl.com/unsubscribe-url&email={{contact.email}}|myurl.com/unsubscribe-url&email={{contact.email}}>

Hello! I’m working on a <https://www.plytix.com/release-notes|new blog project> and I want to include a search bar which only deliver results from that specific blog. Is this possible?
Thanks a million :star-struck:

Guys, what's up? I have a question for you. Is it possible to have a module to add images that go beyond the sections? Or would I just have to create an image that completes the background of my section?
